Posts.Content: MothersDaughterTNBC wrote: Anyone ever had a racing heart on Halaven? My mom has a resting heart rate of 130. She's been to the cardiologist and everything looks fine. I can't seem to find anything about this online. It is shrinking tumors so that's a plus but she gets so out of breath due to the fast heart rate. Just wondering if this will go away when she goes off halaven TIA Dx 7/10/2013, IDC, 5cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 7/18/2013 AC Chemotherapy 9/19/2013 Doxil (doxorubicin) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Halaven and racing heart MothersDaughterTNBC MothersDaughterTNBC
